alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:53AM CDT until June 30 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR WESTERN PUTNAM COUNTY... At 752 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Corydon to 14 miles west of Unionville to 12 miles east of Mercer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Unionville, Lucerne, Powersville and Lemons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
